net.minecraftforge.server.terminalconsole

Class HighlightErrorConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • LogEventPatternConverter
      • net.minecraftforge.server.terminalconsole.HighlightErrorConverter

  • public class HighlightErrorConverter
extends LogEventPatternConverter
    A simplified version of HighlightConverter that uses TerminalConsoleAppender to detect if Ansi escape codes can be used to highlight errors and warnings in the console.

    If configured, it will mark all logged errors with a red color and all warnings with a yellow color. It can be only used together with TerminalConsoleAppender.

    TerminalConsoleAppender.ANSI_OVERRIDE_PROPERTY may be used to force the use of ANSI colors even in unsupported environments.

    Example usage: %highlightError{%level: %message}
